venue.name: New England Shelter for Homeless Veterans

item.description:
Spread a little cheer to the homeless Vets. It will truly bring joy to you and them.

Tim McHale's Boston Minstrels (www.BostonMinstrel.org) and guests will be singing and dancing, rocking and rolling, and bringing good cheer to those who most desreve it! Singers and non-singers are welcome as well as musicians!

Tim has requested that participants show up at 7 sharp (not earlier) and to keep the band set-up area clear!

This is usually an annual event and very touching for all involved!

After the event, many of the participants enjoy the Kinsale Pub right up the street for some cheer and a bite to eat.

The shelter is located at 17 Court St., Boston. You can park on the street or take the T to Government Center.

Come and enjoy! HAPPY HOLIDAYS!!
item.name: Boston Minstrel Holiday Songfest at Veterans Shelter
